Plot: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.
Title: Hollywood Ending
Actors: Téa Leoni, Bob Dorian, Ivan Martin, Gregg Edelman
tomatoConsensus: Although Hollywood Ending contains some zany one-liners, its promising premise is far from developed.
